name: get_list_of_top_level_domains
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tld.
Tool description: Collection of official top level domains
API description: Get an exhaustive list of more than official 1500 generic and country code TLDs for which domains can be registered with.

tlds.description: This queries to check if a specific TLD exist.  If the queried TLDs are found, they are returned in a Json Array. If none are found an empty json array [ ] is returned.
